citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm on
12/2/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by Knocked on door, Called both contact numbers
via Phone, beeped horn, sent an email, and text.. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm on 
12/2/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by Knocked on door, Called both contact numbers 
via Phone, beeped horn, sent an email, and text.. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
